item.title: Glee Cast - Feliz Navidad
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C F G (or G7) Am
Glee’s cover version of Feliz Navidad by sung by Artie Abrams (Kevin McHale) In Season 4 Episode 10. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Oh, No! Silly Bunny - Ukulele Play Along for Easter
item.description:
For educational use.
As performed by ‎Maple Leaf Learning, with the pitch lowered to the key of C.

item.title: Anne Janelle - Angels We Have Heard on High
item.description:
For educational use. A new melody to the traditional Christmas Carol (and a new verse). Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of B-flat. Think it is an unfriendly key? I also transposed the song to C, making it far easier to play (https://youtu.be/gxAvBJza7iM).
As performed by Anne Janelle with James Hill. Anne Janelle is a singer and cello player, and is married to ukulele virtuoso and ukulele educator James Hill. Anne released this song this week--and released a handwritten chart of the chords of the song today, inviting people to play along. As it is Christmas Day, this will be the last Christmas/holiday play along that I create in 2018.
If you are new to the channel and/or ukulele, you can find all kinds of play along videos like these, which allow you to play along with the music you already know and love--sometimes modified to be in more ukulele friendly keys. There are also a number of great ukulele instructors on YouTube, including Cynthia Lin, Kate DeNure (One Music School), John Atkins (The Ukulele Teacher), Mike Lynch (who passed away in January of 2018, but his many videos are still out there to learn from), Stu Fuchs, Aldrine Guerrero (Ukulele Underground) and more.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Still, Still, Still Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. In German
Translation:
Hush, hush, hush The little child wants to sleep Maria sings to him To show him her great love Hush, hush, hush The little child wants to sleep
Sleep, sleep, sleep, My dear child sleep! The angels are making beautiful music, Celebrating the little child Sleep, sleep, sleep, My dear child sleep.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.

item.title: Perry Como - It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Its Beginning To Look Like Xmas
It's Beginning To Look Like Christmas - Perry Como Written by Meredith Willson
Using the chords: A A7 Am B7 C D D7 E7 Em G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
The audio has been adjusted to suit the ukulele better
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
